selections.name: AUTHENTICALLY
selections.reason: Massive class drop from MSW70k to MCL32k. Ran a 76 Beyer-equivalent on 'Good' dirt last out, which is significantly higher than the 56/48 of rivals. Stretching out to a mile should suit the pedigree (Authentic x Medaglia d'Oro).

selections.name: KISS ME COCO
selections.reason: Consistent runner at this level. Speed figure (56) is second best. Rail draw is advantageous for saving ground.

selections.name: LONG RANGE PURSUIT
selections.reason: Lightly raced with room to improve. 9/2 odds offer some value underneath the heavy favorite.

selections.name: CAN YOU DREAM
selections.reason: Adds depth to exotics but speed figures (48) are inferior to the top pick.

selections.name: SPECIAL FLOWER
selections.reason: Finished 3rd in a key race on Jan 9th, beating #1 and #4 significantly. Consistent speed figures in the 80s fit well here.

selections.name: STRANGE ADDICTION
selections.reason: Drops from STR50k to CLM25k. Ran a competitive 85 speed figure last out. 5/1 odds make for a good value play.

selections.name: SHAMROCKIN
selections.reason: Finished behind #3 last time but had a troubled trip (saddle slip). Capable of rebounding.

selections.name: CYPRUS MOON
selections.reason: Speedy type but faded badly in the common race with #3. Needs to hold on.

danger_horse.name: STRANGE ADDICTION
danger_horse.reason: Class dropper with a higher last-race speed figure than the favorite.

selections.name: EAST BOCA KIBBUTZ
selections.reason: Most consistent speed figures (63, 60) in the field. Finished 2nd last out and looks ready to graduate.

selections.name: TUPELO
selections.reason: Aggressive class drop from MSW70k to MCL20k. Speed figure (49) was low due to fading, but the drop should wake her up.

selections.name: CAN'TDEALWITHIT
selections.reason: Recent 60 speed figure puts her right in the mix. Rail draw might be tricky if she doesn't break well.

selections.name: CELESTIAL SKIES
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind #5 last time. Logical minor award contender.

danger_horse.name: TUPELO
danger_horse.reason: The class drop is significant; if she runs back to her old form, she wins.

selections.name: KEAGMAN (IRE)
selections.reason: Finished 4th in a MSW70k last out, beating the ML favorite #1 (who finished 7th). Better value at 5/2 and proven form over #1.

selections.name: BIGGIEBIGGIEBIGGIE
selections.reason: Drops from MSW. Jaramillo rides. Failed to fire last time but the class relief is a major angle.

selections.name: CLASSICO
selections.reason: Speed figures are a step below the top two but consistent enough for the show spot.

selections.name: DREAMRIDER
selections.reason: Longshot with outside chances if the pace collapses.

danger_horse.name: BIGGIEBIGGIEBIGGIE
danger_horse.reason: If the last race was a fluke, he is the class of the field.

selections.name: ALOHA DREAMIN
selections.reason: Dominant speed figure (81) last out while winning a CLM25k. The drop to CLM10k is aggressive (negative drop?), but strictly on numbers, she towers over this field (rivals in 60s).

selections.name: BOOSTER CLUB
selections.reason: Best of the rest with a 66 speed figure recently. Should pick up the pieces.

selections.name: MORGAN'S BLUFF
selections.reason: Consistent mid-60s speed figures. Rail draw is okay for a stalker.

selections.name: WALK'N THE BEACH
selections.reason: Recent form is dull but previous back class exists.

selections.name: CANDY BAR
selections.reason: Ran on dirt last time (likely off-turf) and now returns to preferred turf surface. Drops from AOC50k to CLM25k. Proven winner at this level.

selections.name: SHIN JIDAI (GB)
selections.reason: Highest speed figure (101) but coming off a layoff since November. If ready, she wins, but the layoff is a concern.

selections.name: DEA MATRONA (FR)
selections.reason: Another high-speed horse (104) coming off a long layoff (August). Watch the tote board.

selections.name: CHAI
selections.reason: Consistent check-getter, good for the bottom of exotics.

danger_horse.name: SHIN JIDAI (GB)
danger_horse.reason: Back class and speed figures are superior to the field.

selections.name: GOODGOLLYTIZMOLLY
selections.reason: Ran a huge race on debut (Speed 70, 2nd place) in a MSW70k. The one to beat with natural improvement.

selections.name: TATE BATZ
selections.reason: Also finished 2nd in a MSW on debut (Nov 29) with a 74 speed figure. Layoff is slight concern compared to #1's recency.

selections.name: GOJE
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind #1 in that key race. Logical contender.

selections.name: ANOTHER ZERO
selections.reason: First time starter from a barn that can pop. Watch betting.

danger_horse.name: TATE BATZ
danger_horse.reason: Actually ran a faster figure (74) than the top pick (70), just hasn't raced since Nov.

selections.name: TRUSTY RUSTY
selections.reason: In peak form. Won last out on dirt with a 101 speed figure, and won on turf back in August with a 99. Versatile and fast.

selections.name: SO I'M TOLD
selections.reason: Ran a huge 95 speed figure last out to finish 2nd. 5/1 is great value for a horse in this form.

selections.name: FEEL THE MAGIC
selections.reason: Consistent runner, usually in the money. Good exotic filler.

selections.name: PLEASE FOCUS
selections.reason: Has back class but recent form (74 speed) is a step below the top two.

danger_horse.name: SO I'M TOLD
danger_horse.reason: Recent speed figure of 95 puts him right there with the favorite.
